text.id: Max's Big Ride to End Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy is dedicated to helping to find a cure for Duchenne muscular dystrophy. For the past four years we have been funding research at the Gunning Group Lab at UTM and are currently looking to expand our efforts. Our next major project is to establish a research accelerator to provide early stage micro funding to help share, develop and validate early and innovative Duchenne research while promoting collaboration and open science.
